Summary: white larger than a star orb in north sky, bright in color
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 10:50pm 7-9-13 I stepped into my back lot to let my dog out. As I was waiting I looked up to the sky and saw a larger than a star very bright orb sharped object. The direction was in the northern sky between the bottom of the big dipper and the north star. It wasn't moving when I observed it but then it moved in a north direction getting smaller the farther away it traveled. Also one second it was there, then it wasn't, then it was, then it was gone. The night was cloudless. When I first saw the object I had no thoughts on what it might or might not be, the whole experience happened in a few seconds. Afterward, I collected my thoughts I remembered seeing the same thing a few nights ago. The same area in the northern sky and the same looking object doing the same movements.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Hillsboro
There were no other sightings in Hillsboro on or around July 9th 2013
